definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
literary journal published in 1892-93 by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆 featuring serialized novels in Classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular
The Sing-Song Girls of Shanghai by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆[Han2 Bang1 qing4], long novel of lower life in Classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular/translated into Putonghua as 海上花 by Iris Chang

sentences.english: Chapter Two researches on the exertion of subrogation right of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探讨海上保险代位求偿权的行使。

sentences.english: The petrel came winnowing in from afar on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 海燕从海上遥远的地方振翅飞来。

sentences.english: Would we meet any in this colossal ocean?
sentences.chinese: 我们会在浩瀚的大海上遇见什么人吗？

sentences.english: Disaster situation, the sea shortly world Street bars unable to operate normally.
sentences.chinese: 受灾情影响，短期内海上世界酒吧街无法正常开业。

sentences.english: It will be widely used in development of offshore Yuedong heavy oil reservoir in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在海上月东稠油油藏开发中，将具有广泛的应用前景。

sentences.english: Especially the offshore petroleum industry, which is an industry of relatively high risk.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是海上石油行业，这是一个相对风险性高的行业。

sentences.english: New facilities will include the Universiade City and a marine sports base.
sentences.chinese: 需要新建的包括大学生体育城以及海上运动基地。

sentences.english: The mine has" marine lays mines the hand "the name.
sentences.chinese: 布雷舰有”海上布雷手“之称。

sentences.english: Just breathe that pure sea air!
sentences.chinese: 且请呼吸海上的纯净空气。

sentences.english: A scientist said they were probably picked up by a waterspout or mini-tornado out at sea.
sentences.chinese: 科学家说它们很可能是被龙卷风从海上卷来的。

sentences.english: We can see warships sailing on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到军舰在海上航行。

sentences.english: Kitano musashi narrates the sea, how to lose how encounter tikal emperor god crossbow.
sentences.chinese: 北野武藏叙说海上如何遭遇劲敌，如何失去天皇神弩。

sentences.english: The steamer Artic was wrecked at sea.
sentences.chinese: 阿替克轮船在海上失事。

sentences.english: Since the damage was made only to the turning gear , vessel will carry out sea trial tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 由于损坏仅限于盘车机，该船明天将进行海上实验。

sentences.english: "Over the sea the moon shines bright"?
sentences.chinese: “海上生明月”的下一句是什么啊？

sentences.english: "Yingzhou" is one of the three ancient fairy mountains on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 瀛洲还是古老的海上三仙山之一。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
to go out to sea/(neologism) to expand into overseas markets
East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
